resources.string: Malayopython reticulatus Maximum length exceeding 8.5 meters is non-toxic but has a strong grip so that its prey cannot escape.
Eunectus Maximum length exceeding 8.43 meters is non-toxic but has a strong grip so that its prey cannot escape.
Dendroaspis Maximum length exceeding 4.3 meters in addition to having a deadly venom, the mamba can move very fast and even exceed the speed of human running.

Crotalus sp Maximum length exceeds 1.38 meters. Theuniqueness of this snake is that it attracts its prey by using the tip of its tail which vibratesto make its prey think that it is food. But when the prey approaches he will bite the prey and killit with the poison it has.
Naja Maximum length exceeding 1.8 meters in addition to spreading venom through the bite of a cobra, it can also spit its venom out of its mouth which can cause blindness if it hits the eye.
Vipera beruz Maximum length exceeds 90 centimeters despite having a relatively small size vipers are known to have deadly venom.

Pytas korros Maximum length of more than 2.5 meters, the rice field snake or what is known as the rat-eating snake has no poison, but this snake is able to tightly wrap around the rat to make it easy to eat the rat.

Hydrophiinae Maximum length exceeding 2.7 meters this snake can swim very fast in the water. In addition, sea snakes also have a deadly venom because 1 drop of its venom can kill 1800 people in just 30 minutes.
Acrochordus granulatus Maximum length exceeding 2.4 meters kadut snake is also a snake that lives in water but this snake does not have poison.
Boa constrictor Maximum length exceeding 3.9 meters is non-toxic but has a strong grip so that its prey cannot escape.
